ICA_Website_Development.name: ICA_Website_Development

All content sources from https://github.com/MCERQUA/ECHO2/tree/main/clients/Josh/Insulation_Contractors_Of_Arizona/
Implementation designed for autonomous execution across multiple sessions
Critical constraint: Maximum 1500 lines per file due to message length limits
Tracking system established with checkboxes for progress monitoring
Phase 1: Setup & Structure - PLANNING COMPLETE
Phase 2: Site Configuration - 60% COMPLETE (May 27, 2025)
Phase 3: Core Pages - NOT STARTED
Phase 4: Service Pages - NOT STARTED
Phase 5: Blog Implementation - NOT STARTED
Phase 6: SEO & Performance - NOT STARTED
Phase 7: Styling & Responsive Design - NOT STARTED
Phase 8: Deployment & Testing - NOT STARTED
10 blog articles ready for migration from blog_content folder
Spray foam page has complete component system ready for implementation
Customer testimonials collection with 15+ reviews ready for integration
Project timeline estimated at 4 weeks for complete implementation

STRATEGY: Add ICA blog posts alongside existing content without disruption
Blog naming convention established: YYYY-MM-DD-ica-[slug].md
Phase 2 Progress: Updated site.json, homepage, about, services, contact pages
Added 2 ICA blog posts: Beat Arizona Heat Guide and Insulation Timeline

ICA_SEO_Strategy.name: ICA_SEO_Strategy
observations: Technical SEO improvements: implement proper heading structure, add schema markup, expand homepage content
Content expansion: create detailed service pages, develop location-specific landing pages
Local SEO enhancements: optimize Google Business Profile, build high-quality local citations
Conversion optimization: create linkable content assets, focus on mobile optimization, improve call-to-action elements
200 Citations package ordered as first major SEO implementation
Keyword tracking and monitoring set up in SEMrush
Blog production workflow enhanced with HTML deliverables and sitemap integration
14 deliverable files per blog including complete styled HTML version
Dynamic internal linking through sitemap analysis
ICA styling system ensures consistent visual presentation
Mobile-responsive design elements built into all deliverables
Professional quality standards matching published blog examples
